hanzi-su-wiki:
掃

Значения

Подметать, убирать

Мнемоника

Справа — метла и тряпка жены. Её руки 扌 заняты уборкой.

Варианты

埽, 扫

мести

purpleculture_examples:
掃描 [ sǎo miáo ]: to scan
掃除 [ sǎo chú ]: to sweep; to clean with a brush; to sweep away (often fig.)
掃蕩 [ sǎo dàng ]: to root out; to wipe out
掃帚 [ sào zhou ]: broom
掃帚星 [ sào zhou xīng ]: comet; jinx; bearer of ill luck
掃把 [ sào bǎ ]: broom
掃把星 [ sào bǎ xīng ]: bearer of ill luck; person with the evil eye; comet

heisig_chinese_memo: Whether I sweep something away with my fingers or my broom aprons are required.
heisig_constituent: sweep, finger, fingers, feather duster, broom, apron, crown, towel
koohiiStory1: Whether I SWEEP something away with my FINGERS or my BROOM, I should always wear my APRON.
koohiiStory2: FINGERS of the HOUSEWIFE (in itself, holding a BROOM, with an APRON) busily SWEEP the floor.
jp_example_words:
清掃(せいそう): cleaning
掃く(はく): to brush, sweep, gather up
掃除(そうじ): cleaning, sweeping
WaniKani_Radicals: 扌, ヨ, 冖, 巾
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Wolverine ties a towel around his forehead and takes out his fingers instead of his claws so he can sweep the floor clean. When Wolverine fights, his claws are out and he makes a big ol' mess. But once the fighting is done, it's time to get to work and sweep the mess up.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Picture Wolverine, hair held back with a towel, claws detracted, sweeping up a bar that he just had a big fight in. He's sweeping up broken bottles and broken chairs and broken evil x-men.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Wolverine knows that sweeping is good for the soul (そう). Plus, if you don't help clean up after you defeat bad guys, you're just as bad as them. Sweeping up the mess cleans your soul of any guilt too!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Sweeping is good for the soul. Sweeping is good for the soul. Sweeping is like chicken soup for the soul.
Ru_Radicals: 冖 (ва), 巾 (тряпка), ヨ, 扎
Ru_trainchinese:
sǎo: (глаг) мести, подметать; уничтожать, устранять; быстро перемещать(ся) из стороны в сторону
sào: (графема) метла (используется в многосложных словах)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the hand (扌) with the broom (帚) sweeps
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Use your fingers to grab the broom and sweep.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " hand " to " broom ", it means cleaning with a broom. "Shuowen" has no " sweep " and "埽". " Sao " and "埽" are different bodies. See "埽".

An example of using the original meaning of " sweep " is "Han Feizi. "Ten Passes": "The former Huangdi joined the ghosts and gods on Mount Tai, driving like a car and six dragons, standing side by side, Chi You in front, Feng Bo swept in, and the rain master said." "Han Shu. "The Legend of Her Excellency": "The minister is willing to return to the post of cardinal, and to be swept away by the harem, there is nothing to hate for death, but your majesty pity for wealth and luck, so that all the ministers can live."

The extension of " sweeping " means to eliminate and eliminate. Such as "Selected Works. Zhang Pingzi's "Tokyo Fu": "Sweep Xiangjun Yu Gaixia, Zhao Ziying Yu Zhetu." "Hou Han Shu. "Zang Hong Chuan": "At the beginning of his appointment, he had the same kind of like-minded things, cleared out the invaders, and respected the royal family."

" Sa " also means worship. Such as "Mandarin. "Jin Yu": "The deceased went to the temple to sweep the ancestors and settled in the ancestral temple. Where is the country of the deceased?" Bai Juyi of the Tang Dynasty "Give Du Lushi under the Peak of the Temple of Heaven": "The ingredient of the other day's medicine is one tablet, and the king will go to the Temple of Heaven first. "

" Sweep " means to pass quickly. Such as "Selected Works. Ban Mengjian "Feng Yanran Mountain Inscription": "Then the four schools ran across, the stars were swept away, the depression was thousands of miles, and there were no relics." Tang Dynasty Li Bai's "Big Hunting Fu": "Thousands of rides swept away, and thousands of people thundered. ."

" Sweep " means all, all. Such as "Han Shu. "Chen Sheng Xiangji Biography": "Also, the country's soldiers are newly broken, the king sits on an uneasy seat, sweeps the territory and belongs to the general, the country is in danger, in this one move." "New Tang Book. "Yang Xing Secret Biography": "Since Confucianism has swept the realm, I have fought quickly, and if I can build it, I will be invincible."

" Sweep " means writing and painting. For example, in the Tang Dynasty Li Bai's "Songs of Cursive Script": "My teacher leaned on a rope bed after being drunk, and I had to scan thousands of them." Zhang Hu, "Ji Lingtai": "But I dislike the color of the powder, so I swept the eyebrows towards the supreme."
humanum_short_description_en: From " hand " to " broom ", it means holding a broom to clean.
humanum_full_description:
從「手」從「帚」，表示持帚清潔之意。《說文》無「掃」有「埽」。「掃」和「埽」是異體。參見「埽」。

　　「掃」用本義的例子如《韓非子．十過》：「昔者黃帝合鬼神於泰山之上，駕象車而六蛟龍，畢方並鎋，蚩尤居前，風伯進掃，雨師洒道。」《漢書．佞幸傳》：「臣願歸樞機職，受後宮掃除之役，死無所恨，唯陛下哀憐財幸，以此全活小臣。」

　　「掃」引申表示清除、消滅。如《文選．張平子〈東京賦〉》：「掃項軍於垓下，紲子嬰於軹塗。」《後漢書．臧洪傳》：「受任之初，志同大事，掃清寇逆，共尊王室。」

　　「掃」又表示祭拜。如《國語．晉語》：「亡人苟入掃宗廟，定社稷，亡人何國之與有？」唐代白居易〈天壇峰下贈杜錄事〉：「他日藥成分一粒，與君先去掃天壇。」

　　「掃」表示快速掠過。如《文選．班孟堅〈封燕然山銘〉》：「然後四校橫徂，星流彗掃，蕭條萬里，野無遺寇。」唐代李白〈大獵賦〉：「千騎飈掃，萬眾雷奔。」

　　「掃」表示盡、全部。如《漢書．陳勝項籍傳》：「且國兵新破，王坐不安席，掃境內而屬將軍，國家安危，在此一舉。」《新唐書．楊行密傳》：「儒掃境以來，利速戰，宜堅壁老其師，則我無敵矣。」

　　「掃」表示寫、畫。如唐代李白〈草書歌行〉：「吾師醉後倚繩床，須臾掃盡數千張。」張祜〈集靈臺〉：「卻嫌脂粉污顏色，淡掃蛾眉朝至尊。」
humanum_short_description: 從「手」從「帚」，表示持帚清潔之意。

  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 扌 [ shǒu ] hand
    • 帚 [ zhǒu ] broom, broomstick
①拿笤帚等除去塵土或垃圾：掃地。
②清除，消滅：掃雷。掃盲。掃蕩。一掃而空。
③全，盡，盡其所有：掃數。
④低落，喪失：掃興(xìng)。
⑤描畫：掃描。掃眉。
⑥迅速橫掠而過：掃射。掃視。
⑦結束，了結：掃尾。
⑧祭奠：掃墓。祭掃。

清掃(せいそう): cleaning
掃く(はく): to brush, sweep, gather up
掃除(そうじ): cleaning, sweeping

從「 手 」從「 帚 」，表示持帚清潔之意。《說文》無「 掃 」有「 埽 」。「 掃 」和「 埽 」是異體。參見「 埽 」。 「 掃 」用本義的例子如《韓非子．十過》：「昔者黃帝合鬼神於泰山之上，駕象車而六蛟龍，畢方並鎋，蚩尤居前，風伯進掃，雨師洒道。」《漢書．佞幸傳》：「臣願歸樞機職，受後宮掃除之役，死無所恨，唯陛下哀憐財幸，以此全活小臣。」 「 掃 」引申表示清除、消滅。如《文選．張平子〈東京賦〉》：「掃項軍於垓下，紲子嬰於軹塗。」《後漢書．臧洪傳》：「受任之初，志同大事，掃清寇逆，共尊王室。」 「 掃 」又表示祭拜。如《國語．晉語》：「亡人苟入掃宗廟，定社稷，亡人何國之與有？」唐代白居易〈天壇峰下贈杜錄事〉：「他日藥成分一粒，與君先去掃天壇。」 「 掃 」表示快速掠過。如《文選．班孟堅〈封燕然山銘〉》：「然後四校橫徂，星流彗掃，蕭條萬里，野無遺寇。」唐代李白〈大獵賦〉：「千騎飈掃，萬眾雷奔。」 「 掃 」表示盡、全部。如《漢書．陳勝項籍傳》：「且國兵新破，王坐不安席，掃境內而屬將軍，國家安危，在此一舉。」《新唐書．楊行密傳》：「儒掃境以來，利速戰，宜堅壁老其師，則我無敵矣。」 「 掃 」表示寫、畫。如唐代李白〈草書歌行〉：「吾師醉後倚繩床，須臾掃盡數千張。」張祜〈集靈臺〉：「卻嫌脂粉污顏色，淡掃蛾眉朝至尊。」
From " hand" to " broom", it means cleaning with a broom. "Shuowen" has no " sweep" and " 埽". " Sao" and " 埽" are different bodies. See " 埽". An example of using the original meaning of " sweep" is "Han Feizi. "Ten Passes": "The former Huangdi joined the ghosts and gods on Mount Tai, driving like a car and six dragons, standing side by side, Chi You in front, Feng Bo swept in, and the rain master said." "Han Shu. "The Legend of Her Excellency": "The minister is willing to return to the post of cardinal, and to be swept away by the harem, there is nothing to hate for death, but your majesty pity for wealth and luck, so that all the ministers can live." The extension of " sweeping" means to eliminate and eliminate. Such as "Selected Works. Zhang Pingzi's "Tokyo Fu": "Sweep Xiangjun Yu Gaixia, Zhao Ziying Yu Zhetu." "Hou Han Shu. "Zang Hong Chuan": "At the beginning of his appointment, he had the same kind of like-minded things, cleared out the invaders, and respected the royal family." " Sa" also means worship. Such as "Mandarin. "Jin Yu": "The deceased went to the temple to sweep the ancestors and settled in the ancestral temple. Where is the country of the deceased?" Bai Juyi of the Tang Dynasty "Give Du Lushi under the Peak of the Temple of Heaven": "The ingredient of the other day's medicine is one tablet, and the king will go to the Temple of Heaven first. " " Sweep" means to pass quickly. Such as "Selected Works. Ban Mengjian "Feng Yanran Mountain Inscription": "Then the four schools ran across, the stars were swept away, the depression was thousands of miles, and there were no relics." Tang Dynasty Li Bai's "Big Hunting Fu": "Thousands of rides swept away, and thousands of people thundered. ." " Sweep" means all, all. Such as "Han Shu. "Chen Sheng Xiangji Biography": "Also, the country's soldiers are newly broken, the king sits on an uneasy seat, sweeps the territory and belongs to the general, the country is in danger, in this one move." "New Tang Book. "Yang Xing Secret Biography": "Since Confucianism has swept the realm, I have fought quickly, and if I can build it, I will be invincible." " Sweep" means writing and painting. For example, in the Tang Dynasty Li Bai's "Songs of Cursive Script": "My teacher leaned on a rope bed after being drunk, and I had to scan thousands of them." Zhang Hu, "Ji Lingtai": "But I dislike the color of the powder, so I swept the eyebrows towards the supreme."

掃字的基本解释

掃
sǎo

掃
sào
均见“扫”。

掃字的汉语字典释义

[①]［sǎo］
［《廣韻》蘇老切，上晧，心。］
［《廣韻》蘇到切，去号，心。］
“扫1”的繁体字。亦作“埽1”。“騷2”的被通假字。
(1)用扫帚除去污秽。
(2)清除；平定。
(3)指摧折之使失去。
(4)祭扫。
(5)尽；全部。
(6)掠过；吹拂。
(7)画；写。
[②]［sào］
“扫2”的繁体字。
见“掃2帚”、“掃2彗”。

掃字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　掃； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页436第14
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?蘇老切，音嫂。弃也，拚除也。【詩·大雅】洒掃廷內。　又鬧掃，髻名。【三夢記】鬧掃，猶盤雅墮馬之類也。唐詩云：還梳鬧掃學宮妝。　又【唐韻】【廣韻】蘇到切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】先到切，?音譟。義同。【論語】當洒掃應對進退，則可矣。　本作埽。又與騷通。別詳土部，馬部。

掃字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
掃字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [sǎo]
["Guangyun" Su Laoqie, Shang Hao, Heart. ]
["Guangyun" Su Daqie, Quhao, Xin. ]
The traditional Chinese character of "Scan 1". Also known as "埽1". The false character of "Sao 2" was passed.
(1) Use a broom to remove dirt.
(2) Clear; calm down.
(3) Refers to the destruction of the cause of loss.
(4) Sacrifice and sweep.
(5) All; all.
(6) Passing; blowing.
(7) Painting; writing.
[②]［sào］
The traditional Chinese character of "Scan 2".
See "Sweep 2 Brooms", "Sweep 2 Comes".
sweep
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Collection] [Hand Character Department] 　Scan; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 436 14
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun]? Su Laoqie, Yin's wife. Abandon it, fight it out. 【Poetry·Daya】Sweeping inside the court.　Sweep again, updo. [Three Dreams] Sweeping, like panya falling into a horse. Tang Shiyun: I also slapped up school makeup.　 [Tang Yun] [Guang Yun] Su Daoqie [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun] First come and cut,? The sound is noisy. The same meaning. [The Analects of Confucius] When Sasao responds to advances and retreats, it can be done.　This is a 埽. Also communicate with Sao. Don't know the Ministry of Soil and Horse.

Name meaning

sǎo, sào
вм. 扫
Radicals: 扌, ヨ, 冖, 巾  (fingers, wolverine, forehead, towel)
Meaning Mnemonic
Wolverine ties a towel around his forehead and takes out his fingers instead of his claws so he can sweep the floor clean. When Wolverine fights, his claws are out and he makes a big ol' mess. But once the fighting is done, it's time to get to work and sweep the mess up.
Picture Wolverine, hair held back with a towel, claws detracted, sweeping up a bar that he just had a big fight in. He's sweeping up broken bottles and broken chairs and broken evil x-men.
Reading Mnemonic
Wolverine knows that sweeping is good for the soul (そう). Plus, if you don't help clean up after you defeat bad guys, you're just as bad as them. Sweeping up the mess cleans your soul of any guilt too!
Sweeping is good for the soul. Sweeping is good for the soul. Sweeping is like chicken soup for the soul.
